import React, {useState} from 'react' import './Account.css' import Header from './Header' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import {db} from '../../services/firebase' import firebase from 'firebase' const GiveReview = (props) => { //props const user = props.user //states const [text, setText] = useState('') //Functionality const giveReview = () => { db.collection('Reviews').doc(`${user.email}-${user.totalValue}`).set({ user: user.email, review: text, stars: document.getElementById('review').value, date: firebase.firestore.Timestamp.now() }).then(res => { alert(`Thanks for your review! We appreciate your time.`) setText('') props.history.goBack() return props.history.goBack() }) } return( <>
